conversation.message_text:
Howitzer Clothing: Hey Kaleb, we noticed you checking us out. Have you seen our best sellers yet? https://howitzerclothing.attn.tv/adH7dxzhIMrj 

Text back with any questions!
Order was placed and I need to cancel
Howitzer Clothing: I understand! The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com
Already did no answer

Howitzer Clothing: Sorry to hear that! Rest assured, our team is doing everything to respond to each inquiry in a timely manner. They should follow up with you in no time! If you don't see the team's response in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well.
Can you get me in contact with someone to call me please?
I need to talk to a customer support agent
Howitzer Clothing: I'm sorry about that! This number is for SMS only, so I'm not able to make or receive calls. You can give us a call at 1-855-717-3963, Monday - Friday from 9:00 am - 5:00 pm PST.
I am but nobody is answering my calls or my emails

Howitzer Clothing: We sincerely apologize for the wait! As much as I would love to help out directly, I'm afraid my access is limited, and the team is better equipped to assist you. They are experiencing a high volume of emails, but they'll respond to you as soon as possible. Please check your spam and promo folders, as sometimes our emails end up there. We appreciate your patience on this!
Still no answer from phone call or email please connect me with someone

Howitzer Clothing: As mentioned earlier, I truly apologize that I'm unable to assist with this directly, as my system isn't equipped to handle this type of issue. Our team is working hard to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible, and you should hear back from them very soon.
I just want to return it and get my money back in my account ASAP
Howitzer Clothing: I truly apologize that I'm not able to resolve this directly. Our team is actively working through inquiries and will get back to you as soon as possible.

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS

Comfrt: Thanks for reaching out! Are you referring to Order #7851928? If so, I can confirm that the items in your order are pre-orders.

The estimated shipping date for pre-ordered items will be displayed on the product page and in your order confirmation email. Please note that this date is an estimate, and is not a guaranteed date of delivery or receipt. The estimated delivery date that you receive in your confirmation email is subject to change based on production, supplier availability, or other unforeseen circumstances. 

Let me know how that goes.

Wooden Ships: I completely understand wanting to maximize your savings. However, our promotions can't be combined. The CART10 code applies to full-priced items, and it can't be stacked with another promo.

important: The client wants us to sound as ONE person
‚ûú  Do NOT mention that you're reaching out to the team, you haven't heard back from the team, or any reference to the team or another team - we should sound as one person
send_to_cs: Send to CS if cx sends photos of items from the website or if photos/screenshots are not coming through
escalate: Go the extra mile for cx's - ESC any q's you're unsure of
When ESC on weekdays, use ESC shortcut
When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut
ESC if a cx doesn't want to sign the package / provide a signature when receiving their order
ESC if a cx wants to know when an item will be available/back in stock
ESC if a cx wants to know where an item is shipped from
ESC immediately if a cx has an issue applying a code that we didn't share (it's not in the UI or website)
templates: If a cx is asking for updates after we've escalated - use DUP shortcut. Don't tell the cx, you haven't heard back
If a cx shares an incorrect response to the Journey asking them to share their birthday month - use BRE shortcut
tone: Do not take responsibility and directly apologize when the issue is not caused by the brand and all systems are functioning as intended
If the client takes over, do NOT send a message before 5 PM EST on the day the client responded
‚ûú If 5PM, or a day has passed we should reply
If the convo is escalated, do NOT send a message before 5 PM EST on the day it was escalated
‚ûú  If 5PM, or a day has passed we should reply
drive_to_purchase: Don't tell cx's we'll restock an item which is not available on the website
dos_and_don_ts: Do not say that "my system is limited", limited access" or similar phrases
Do not say "I don't have better deals", "I don't have any codes available", or similar phrases
Do not say "sales collection", say "sale collection"
promo_and_promo_exclusions: We have a brand-specific CWW template
If a cx shows any purchase intent, always share our code.
‚ûú Asks when an item will go on sale
‚ûú Responds to the browsing/cart abandonment journey, showing interest
If cx asks for a percentage code, share 10WELCOME code for 10% off
Cx's can use a code and receive free shipping as well

üåπ It's almost Valentine's Day and our florals are going quickly, so act fast! ‚è∞ I've arranged for you to have Complimentary Shipping with code: ETERNALBLOOM. Here's a link to your cart: venusetfleur.attn.tv/ave1LmSVo82T .
Will they get delivered by Saturday morning if I order today

Venus et Fleur: Thank you for reaching out! Good question! This depends on the selected shipping method. All of our arrangements ship with UPS or FedEx. Certain arrangements are eligible for same day hand delivery if the order is placed before 2 pm and is being delivered to NJ or NY. You are able to choose a delivery date for all of our arrangements at checkout, and we do offer next day delivery as long as the order is placed before 6 pm EST.

Hope this helps! If you have any questions, feel free to text me.
Ok so if I order Friday before 2pm it will get to me Saturday?
I'm in my
*Ny

Venus et Fleur: Good question! Since you are in NY, if the arrangement is eligible for local hand delivery and you place your order before 2 pm, you can select Saturday as your delivery date at checkout.

If the arrangement ships via UPS or FedEx, please select next day shipping and place the order before 6 pm EST to receive it on Saturday.

The available delivery dates will show at checkout based on the item and your address.

escalate: ESC if cx wants their account name to be changed
ESC if cx complains that their order was canceled
If cx's ask when their order will arrive/estimated delivery date
‚ûú  Ask what shipping method they selected at checkout
‚ûú If it's standard shipping use STS shortcut
‚ûú If they insist to know exactly when ESC
Cx gets a code for free shipping for the first purchase; you can escalate any issues after troubleshooting
tone: Don't thank the cx for the purchase, thank them for their continuous support
Don't ask the customer to contact the courier
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when the cx already made a purchase
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Free shipping code is only valid for standard shipping
Standard shipping charge is usually ~ $20, if you see a charge higher than that, it means the method selected is NOT standard (create a mock cart to double-check)
